subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Frank Thomas broke a fifth-inning tie with his 11th career grand slam, Vernon Wells added a two-run homer and the Toronto Blue Jays defeated the Boston Red Sox, 7-4, on Sunday to complete a three-game sweep.
snippet: Frank Thomas broke a fifth-inning tie with his 11th career grand slam, Vernon Wells added a two-run homer and the Toronto Blue Jays defeated the Boston Red Sox, 7-4, on Sunday to complete a three-game sweep.
